full_summary:
### Solicitation for Forensic Child Interviewing Workshops

#### Contract Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01018285
* **Solicitation Number**: M5000-22-05182/A
* **Publication Date**: December 21, 2022
* **Tender Closin Date**: January 20, 2023, 15:00:00
* **Estimated Contract Start/Finalize Date**: Three years

#### Background

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a contractor to deliver workshops in forensic child interviewing techniques. The workshops will be delivered in Alberta and Saskatchewan on an as-and-when requested basis.

#### Security and Confidentiality

This solicitation contains security requirements.

#### Tenders Evaluation Criteria

* Tenders must comply with the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation
* Mandatory technical evaluation criteria must be met

#### Trade Agreements

The RCMP has identified the following trade agreements that apply:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Procedure for Tenders

Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit (NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca). The contract period will be for three years from the date of contract with an option to extend for up to one additional year.

#### Additional Documents

The attached documents provide further information. Bidders are required to download and review the attached documents. Canada is not responsible for any third-party website content or information. It is the bidder's responsibility to regularly consult the Canadian Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

Note: Attachments can be found online via the specified link. Please consult the attached tender documents to obtain further information.

#### Contact Information

* Project Authority: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Contact Person: Shawn Balaski
* Email: shawn.m.balask
